long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rin-dates provides a mini pop-up interface that allows you to edit your personal https://myanimelist.net/ account's episode progression from any website. Instead of having to visit the website every time you finish an episode, you can simply open up the extension popup and edit your progress of the show you're watching instantly.
